title: Increased income, increased demand for pizza

content.question: Which of the following will increase the demand for pizza, a normal good?

choices.label: An increase in the cost of producing pizza
A decrease in the price of pizza
An increase in the price of a complementary product
An increase in the number of restaurants selling pizza

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
